ygData.subject: Re: /Con Guide
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve noticed some of the msgs for that guide don t mix for me either. However, I thought it was just my bad memory hitting. I thought I ve seen blue cons that
ygData.messageBody:
I've noticed some of the msgs for that guide
don't mix for me either. However, I thought it was just
my bad memory hitting. I thought I've seen blue cons
that said "quite formidable". They've probably changed
a few things that guides haven't updated. But for
the most part--- that con guide's pretty good. I
haven't seen it anywhere online though. Where does it
come from?<br><br>Also, hide/sneak is supposed to work
like camo/invis. And as far as I can tell-- animals
can see through the hide/sneak/camo/invis sometimes
for some reason. It's almost as if they aren't as
affected b/c of smell. I haven't noticed the affect as my
level and skill in div went up though.<br><br>Keep in
mind that I only count Bears, and Lions in this mix.
Griffs and other mytical animals I don't really count.
<br><br>Oh, and yes. Con really helps. And as always, I
recommend-- go out to places that you like to kill, find a
group. If possible, get the group to lead ya to the next
best spot to group and kill. Then you will find the
next spot to go to find groups -- which will then get
you more groups to lead to new spots.
=)<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic Druid of the 29th (ooh
I love<br>29th. I may have spent 175 plat and not
even come close to getting all my spells of the
29th... but oooooh. =)<br><br>PS... yep. I'm crazy about
groups. I'll advertise them whenever possible.
